name: Titanium.UI.MaskedImage
summary: A control that displays an image composited with a background image or color.

properties.name: image
properties.description:
Specify a local file path.

Unlike the standard Titanium.UI.ImageView, images cannot be specified using a remote URL, Titanium.Blob, or Titanium.Filesystem.File object.

properties.name: mask
properties.description:
Specify a local file path.

Unlike the standard Titanium.UI.ImageView, images cannot be specified using a remote URL, Titanium.Blob, or Titanium.Filesystem.File object.

properties.name: mode
properties.summary: Blend mode to use to combine layers.

properties.name: tint
properties.summary: Color to combine with the image, as a color name or hex triplet.
properties.description: For information about color values, see the "Colors" section of Titanium.UI.
